languages.text: Братство Сангвиналиев-госпитальеров, — духовная община в рядах Экклезиархии, — заинтересовалось набожным Фолстоуном и готово основать на нем святилище-санаториум. Лекари, вооруженные скальпелями и диагносторами, будут врачевать здесь недуги, устанавливать аугментации калекам и бдительно следить за генетическими отклонениями среди колонистов.

traits.locale_text: Возвести великий Госпиталь, в котором будут помогать больным и раненым. Пригласить малый орден Сороритас, чтобы опекать его.

languages.text: The Hospitaller Priesthood of the Sanguinalians, a spiritual community within the Ecclesiarchy, has taken an interest in the pious world of Foulstone and offers to found a sanatorium sanctum on it. There, armed with scalpels and diagnostors, healers will cure diseases, furnish the disabled with augmentations, and keep a vigilant eye out for genetic anomalies among the colonists.
languages.original_text: Братство Сангвиналиев-госпитальеров, — духовная община в рядах Экклезиархии, — заинтересовалось набожным Фолстоуном и готово основать на нем святилище-санаториум. Лекари, вооруженные скальпелями и диагносторами, будут врачевать здесь недуги, устанавливать аугментации калекам и бдительно следить за генетическими отклонениями среди колонистов.

traits.locale_text: The hospitaller brotherhood of the Sanguinalians, a spiritual community within the Ecclesiarchy, has taken an interest in the pious world of Foulstone and offers to found a Sanatorium sanctum on it. There, armed with scalpels and diagnostors, healers will cure diseases, furnish the disabled with augmentations, and keep a vigilant eye for genetic anomalies among the colonists.

The hospitaller brotherhood of the Sanguinalians, a spiritual community within the Ecclesiarchy, has taken an interest in the pious world of Foulstone and offers to found a Sanatorium sanctum on it. There, armed with scalpels and diagnostors, healers will cure diseases, furnish the disabled with augmentations, and keep a vigilant eye for genetic anomalies among the colonists.

There, armed with scalpels and diagnostors, healers will cure diseases, furnish the disabled with augmentations, and keep a vigilant eye out for genetic anomalies among the colonists.

The Hospitaller Brotherhood of the Sanguinalians, a spiritual community within the Ecclesiarchy, has taken an interest in the pious world of Foulstone and offers to found a Sanatorium sanctum on it. There, armed with scalpels and diagnostors, healers will cure diseases, furnish the disabled with augmentations, and keep a vigilant eye out for genetic anomalies among the colonists.

The Hospitaller Priesthood of the Sanguinalians, a spiritual community within the Ecclesiarchy, has taken an interest in the pious world of Foulstone and offers to found a sanatorium sanctum on it. There, armed with scalpels and diagnostors, healers will cure diseases, furnish the disabled with augmentations, and keep a vigilant eye out for genetic anomalies among the colonists.

languages.text: El Sacerdocio Hospitalario de los Sanguinarios, una comunidad espiritual de la Eclesiarquía, se ha interesado por el piadoso planeta de Rocainmunda y ofrece fundar un sanctum sanatorio en él. Allí, armados de bisturíes y diagnostors, los sanadores tratarán enfermedades, ofrecerán aumentos a los discapacitados y vigilarán a los colonos por si mostraran anomalías genéticas.
languages.original_text: The Hospitaller Priesthood of the Sanguinalians, a spiritual community within the Ecclesiarchy, has taken an interest in the pious world of Foulstone and offers to found a sanatorium sanctum on it. There, armed with scalpels and diagnostors, healers will cure diseases, furnish the disabled with augmentations, and keep a vigilant eye out for genetic anomalies among the colonists.

traits.locale_text: El Sacerdocio Hospitalario de los Sanguinarios, una comunidad espiritual de la Eclesiarquía, se ha interesado por el piadoso planeta de Rocainmunda y ofrece fundar un sanctum sanatorio en él. Allí, armados de bisturíes y diagnostors, los sanadores tratarán enfermedades, ofrecerán aumentos a los discapacitados y vigilarán a los colonos por si mostraran anomalías genéticas.

languages.text: Le Clergé Hospitalier des Sanguinaliens, une communauté spirituelle au sein de l'Ecclésiarchie, s'intéresse au monde pieux de Rochepeste et propose d'y bâtir un sanatorium. Armés de scalpels et de diagnostiqueurs, les guérisseurs y soigneront les maladies, fourniront des augmentations aux infirmes et garderont un œil vigilant sur les anomalies génétiques qui frappent les colons.
languages.original_text: The Hospitaller Priesthood of the Sanguinalians, a spiritual community within the Ecclesiarchy, has taken an interest in the pious world of Foulstone and offers to found a sanatorium sanctum on it. There, armed with scalpels and diagnostors, healers will cure diseases, furnish the disabled with augmentations, and keep a vigilant eye out for genetic anomalies among the colonists.

traits.locale_text: La Confrérie Hospitalière des Sanguinaliens, une communauté spirituelle au sein de l'Ecclésiarchie, s'intéresse au monde pieux de Rochepeste et propose d'y bâtir un sanatorium. Armés de scalpels et de diagnostiqueurs, les guérisseurs y soigneront les maladies, fourniront des augmentations aux infirmes et garderont un œil vigilant sur les anomalies génétiques qui frappent les colons.

languages.text: 帝国国教内部的精神团体“神圣之血”医师教团，对荒寂岩地这个由虔诚之人居住的世界产生了浓厚的兴趣，提出要在那里建立疗养圣所。届时，治疗师会配备全套手术器械与诊断装置，在那里为民众治愈疾病，为残障人士提供植入物，同时密切关注殖民者的基因突变情况。
languages.original_text: The Hospitaller Priesthood of the Sanguinalians, a spiritual community within the Ecclesiarchy, has taken an interest in the pious world of Foulstone and offers to found a sanatorium sanctum on it. There, armed with scalpels and diagnostors, healers will cure diseases, furnish the disabled with augmentations, and keep a vigilant eye out for genetic anomalies among the colonists.

traits.locale_text: 帝国国教内部的精神团体“神圣之血”医师教团，对荒寂岩地这个由虔诚之人居住的世界产生了浓厚的兴趣，提出要在那里建立疗养圣所。届时，治疗师会配备全套手术器械与诊断装置，在那里为民众治愈疾病，为残障人士提供植入物，同时密切关注殖民者的基因突变情况。

languages.text: サングリニアンのホスピタルの聖職は、帝国聖教会の精神的共同体であり、敬虔な世界であるファウルストーンに興味を持ち、そこにサナトリウムの聖域を設立することを申し出た。そこでは、メスとディアグノスターで武装した治療師たちが病気を治し、身体障害者にオーグメティックを与えながら、入植者の遺伝子の異常を警戒することになる。
languages.original_text: The Hospitaller Priesthood of the Sanguinalians, a spiritual community within the Ecclesiarchy, has taken an interest in the pious world of Foulstone and offers to found a sanatorium sanctum on it. There, armed with scalpels and diagnostors, healers will cure diseases, furnish the disabled with augmentations, and keep a vigilant eye out for genetic anomalies among the colonists.

traits.locale_text: サングリニアンの医療修道女の同胞団は、帝国聖教会の精神的共同体であり、敬虔な世界であるファウルストーンに興味を持ち、そこにサナトリウムの聖域を設立することを申し出た。そこでは、メスとディアグノスターで武装した治療師たちが病気を治し、身体障害者にオーグメティックを与えながら、入植者の遺伝子の異常を警戒することになる。
サングリニアンの医療修道女の同胞団は、帝国聖教会の精神的共同体であり、敬虔な世界であるファウルストーンに興味を持ち、そこにサナトリウムの聖域を設立することを申し出た。そこでは、メスとディアグノスターで武装した治療師たちが病気を治し、身体障害者にオーグメティックを与えながら、入植者の遺伝子の異常を警戒することになる。

languages.text: Die Hospitalis-Priesterschaft der Sanguinalier, eine spirituelle Gemeinschaft innerhalb der Ekklesiarchie, hat ein Interesse an der frommen Welt Foulstone entwickelt und bietet an, dort ein Sanatorium sanctum zu gründen. Bewaffnet mit Skalpellen und Diagnostoren werden Heiler dort Krankheiten heilen, Verwundete mit Augmentationen ausstatten und mit wachsamem Auge nach genetischen Anomalien unter den Kolonisten suchen.
languages.original_text: The Hospitaller Priesthood of the Sanguinalians, a spiritual community within the Ecclesiarchy, has taken an interest in the pious world of Foulstone and offers to found a sanatorium sanctum on it. There, armed with scalpels and diagnostors, healers will cure diseases, furnish the disabled with augmentations, and keep a vigilant eye out for genetic anomalies among the colonists.

traits.locale_text: Die Hospitalis-Bruderschaft der Sanguinalier, eine spirituelle Gemeinschaft innerhalb der Ekklesiarchie, hat ein Interesse an der frommen Welt Foulstone entwickelt und bietet an, dort ein Sanatorium sanctum zu gründen. Bewaffnet mit Skalpellen und Diagnostoren werden Heiler dort Krankheiten heilen, Verwundete mit Augmentationen ausstatten und mit wachsamem Auge nach genetischen Anomalien unter den Kolonisten suchen.

Die Hospitalis-Bruderschaft der Sanguinalier, eine spirituelle Gemeinschaft innerhalb der Ekklesiarchie, hat ein Interesse an der frommen Welt Foulstone entwickelt und bietet an, dort ein Sanatorium sanctum zu gründen. Bewaffnet mit Skalpellen und Diagnostoren werden Heiler dort Krankheiten heilen, Verwundete mit Augmentationen ausstatten und mit wachsamem Auge nach genetischen Anomalien unter den Kolonisten suchen.

languages.text: Ekleşiarşi bünyesindeki ruhani bir topluluk olan Kancıl Hospitalye Rahipliği, dindar dünya Menfurtaş'a gösterdikleri ilgiyi burada mukaddes bir sanatoryum kurma isteklerini belirterek ortaya koydu. Neşterler ve teşhis aletleriyle donatılmış şifacılar, burada hastalıklara çare bulup malullere ogmentasyon takacak ve koloniciler arasında baş gösteren genetik sapaklıkları gözetecek.
languages.original_text: The Hospitaller Priesthood of the Sanguinalians, a spiritual community within the Ecclesiarchy, has taken an interest in the pious world of Foulstone and offers to found a sanatorium sanctum on it. There, armed with scalpels and diagnostors, healers will cure diseases, furnish the disabled with augmentations, and keep a vigilant eye out for genetic anomalies among the colonists.
